cyclone.name: DORIAN
cyclone.current_location: about 160 mi SE of Nantucket, Massachusetts
cyclone.trajectory: tracking northeast toward Nova Scotia and Newfoundland

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch for Prince Edward Island and the Magdalen Islands (Canada)
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning for Eastern Nova Scotia (Lower East Pubnico to Brule) and Western Newfoundland (Indian Harbour to Hawke's Bay); Tropical-Storm Warning from Woods Hole MA to Eastport ME and parts of Atlantic Canada
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Southeastern New England to Atlantic Canada
weather_observation.wind: No significant winds expected at Port of Charleston, SC for the remainder of the event; Dorian is well offshore and moving away.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Long-period swells and rip currents may persist along the South Carolina coast even though the cyclone has departed.
